price: “None Allah yatugororeye, aturinda ibihano by’umuriro utwika.”
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
